title: Danny Meyer Restaurants to Eliminate Tipping
text:
Published By: NYTimes Dining & Wine - Today 
Starting with the Modern, at the Museum of Modern Art, acclaimed restaurants like Union Square Cafe and Gramercy Tavern will be affected.... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
